name: Gear Plus Demo
description:
(Demo made in Rpgmaker MV)

You are starting at a new school, H.I.V.E Combat Academy or Hive for short, attend lessons or train hard to become stronger and explorer the nearby town of Garedokan.

Level up and find skill book to enable you to equip different variant of weapons

Gain access to magical gems called M.A.Gs and harness the elements

BECOME THE ACE STUDENT!
